pr_title: Scripting: stats per context in nodes stats

timeline.message: Scripting: stats per context in nodes stats

timeline.bodyText: Will this become onOrAfter(Version.V_7_7_0) once bwc tests are handled?
timeline.author: williamrandolph

replies.bodyText: v7.7.0 is feature frozen today.  I'm not sure I'll make that, so I expected to keep this as-is, but interested in thoughts.
replies.author: stu-elastic

replies.bodyText: You likely wont' make it, but the logic should always be written with onOrAfter. Once the freeze happens (the branch is cut), the 7.8 constant will be added, and you can update to that.
replies.author: rjernst

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be less confusing if this value matched the parameter in NodeStatsRequest (i.e. script_cache). I think in all other cases the option in the request matches the key in the response.
timeline.author: williamrandolph
